name.maxlength: Your name cannot be longer than 50 characters.

surname.maxlength: Your surname cannot be longer than 50 characters.

birthdate.invalid: Your birthdate is invalid, must be less than today.
birthdate.pattern: Your birthdate can only contain letters.

dateRepetition.invalid: Date repetition is invalid, must be greater than today.
